boot_command: <esc><esc><esc><esc>set gfxpayload=1024x768 <enter>linux /install/vmlinuz preseed/url=http://{{.HTTPIP}}:{{.HTTPPort}}/{{user `os_name`}}/{{user `os_type`}}.cfg debian-installer=en_US auto locale=en_US kbd-chooser/method=us hostname={{.Name}} fb=false debconf/frontend=noninteractive keyboard-configuration/modelcode=SKIP keyboard-configuration/layout=USA keyboard-configuration/variant=USA console-setup/ask_detect=false <enter>initrd /install/initrd.gz <enter>boot <enter>
